name: Rose
description: A beautiful flower symbolizing love and romance.

name: Tulip
description: A vibrant flower available in various colors.

name: Sunflower
description: A cheerful flower with a bright yellow color.

name: Daisy
description: A simple yet beautiful flower with a white or yellow center.

name: Lily
description: An elegant flower with large, trumpet-shaped blooms.

name: Orchid
description: A delicate flower often associated with luxury and beauty.

name: Carnation
description: A versatile flower available in various colors and often used in bouquets.

name: Hydrangea
description: A cluster of small flowers forming a large, showy bloom.

name: Peony
description: A fragrant flower with large, fluffy blooms.

name: Crocus
description: An early spring flower known for its vibrant colors.

name: Daffodil
description: A cheerful flower with bright yellow blooms.

name: Cherry Blossom
description: A symbol of beauty and renewal, cherry blossoms bloom in springtime.
